publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7662 Cathy Peattie: International Rescue—That the Parliament congratulates International Rescue on its work throughout the world, saving lives in a wide variety of emergencies and disasters, including the assistance that it recently gave NHS Forth Valley in assisting medical personnel with transport and by clearing snow toenable visits to be made to snowbound patients’ homes. Supported by: Christina McKelvie*, Jackie Baillie*, Mary Mulligan*, Cathy Jamieson*, Stewart Maxwell*, Patricia Ferguson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Kenneth Gibson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Karen Whitefield*, Helen Eadie*
S3M-7662 International Rescue (lodged on 23 December 2010) Elaine Smith*, Elaine Murray*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Pauline McNeill*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-7662 International Rescue (lodged on 23 December 2010) Robin Harper*
S3M-7662 International Rescue (lodged on 23 December 2010) Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-7662 International Rescue (lodged on 23 December 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-7662 International Rescue (lodged on 23 December 2010) Jack McConnell*
S3M-7662 International Rescue (lodged on 23 December 2010) Linda Fabiani*
S3M-7662 International Rescue (lodged on 23 December 2010) Stuart McMillan*

S3M-7662 Cathy Peattie: International Rescue—That the Parliament congratulates International Rescue on its work throughout the world, saving lives in a wide variety of emergencies and disasters, including the assistance that it recently gave NHS Forth Valley in assisting medical personnel with transport and by clearing snow to enable visits to be made to snowbound patients’ homes. Supported by: Christina McKelvie, Jackie Baillie, Mary Mulligan, Cathy Jamieson, Stewart Maxwell, Patricia Ferguson, Jamie McGrigor, Kenneth Gibson, Hugh O’Donnell, Karen Whitefield, Helen Eadie, Elaine Smith, Elaine Murray, Dr Richard Simpson, Pauline McNeill, Hugh Henry, Robin Harper, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Jamie Hepburn, Jack McConnell, Linda Fabiani, Stuart McMillan
